relationship: Solicited pitch (editor asked you to pitch)

comment: "Editor changed their mind a lot about the edits which resulted in more work than expected, and the publication usually takes a while to get back to about payment, around 2-3 months."

relationship: Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)

comment: "They initially offered $50 for an 800-word piece which I considered very low. I didn't want to risk losing the deal as this would be my first article with them, so I only bumped it up to $80 and they responded with $75."
""I was given a rate of $150-300, but i heard from another editor that I was 'low-balled' and that many writeres with bigger rep than mine are paid considerably more""
